name: METAVERSE [BETA]
description:
Welcome to the Metaverse Beta, a testing ground for what will become the most innovative interactive online experience on the planet. 

Built on cutting edge technology by some of the most "competent" developers and underpaid animators in Asia, the Metaverse will entertain you for minutes on end.

Some may question our motives, but be assured: The Metaverse is benevolent. The Metaverse will change the face of the internet.

The Metaverse will soon be all.

Built on UPBGE 0.3 // c.2022
